name: Smashed Cucumber Salad
description: This refreshing salad is perfect for hot summer days. The cucumbers are smashed and tossed with a tangy dressing, then topped with toasted sesame seeds and red pepper flakes for crunch and heat.
instructions: Using a meat mallet or rolling pin, smash the cucumbers, then slice into bite-size pieces and transfer to a large bowl.
Add the red onion, salt, and sugar, and toss to combine.
In a small bowl, combine the soy sauce, rice vinegar, and sesame oil.
Drizzle the dressing over the cucumbers, then toss to coat.
Garnish with toasted sesame seeds and red pepper flakes.
